Description
MORINGA FROM BOTANICAL ORGANICS is a SUPERFOOD
Your Problem. – Liver, pancreas and kidney problems, tired, lack of energy, malnutrition.
Your Solution. – Superfood helps increase energy and endurance, aids digestion, promotes a better function of liver, pancreas and kidneys, boost immune system, supports nervous system.
PRODUCT DETAILS
Moringa is considered a superfood, to the extent that it is one of the richest plant sources for protein, calcium, potassium, and Vitamins A and C; delivering a powerful nutrition for overall well being.
It is also known as the ultimate, natural energy and endurance health supplement. It is one of the most secret performance enhancing products taken by athletes today who ingest mega‐doses that help them physically and mentally.
According to the Annals of the Ayurveda, India’s oldest tradition of medicines, the leaves of the Moringa plant could treat at least 300 diseases.
It provides 7 times the Vitamin C in oranges; 4 times the calcium in milk; 4 times the Vitamin A in carrots; 2 times the protein in milk; 3 times the potassium in bananas.
Moringa increases the body’s natural defenses, promotes metabolism with bio‐available components.
Promotes cellular structure for the body, promotes energy and aids digestion.
Contains: Moringa Leaf Extract
HOW TO USE
For best results, take two veggie caps two times per day with water, or as directed by your health care professional.
